thread.section_title: Avis marchands de Upperwine | Avis - Upperwine | upperwine.com
thread.title: Sanjeev D'souza

author: Sanjeev D'souza
title: Sanjeev D'souza
text: Professionals with a passion, only way to describe the Upperwine team. They are not there to make a sale, they will accompany you and listen to your needs, then guide you in the choice. Its more than just the wine, its about them knowing the producers, the processes, the cultivation methods and their resistance to mass production. A solid recomendation, have been very happy for a couple of years and never hesitated to recomend them to people who can appreciate the 'nectar of the Gods'!
